resources.string: Hello! Welcome to the another screen.\n

1. To create the new screen, first create a layout or an activity (the layout is automatically created in the layout folder).

2. Now choose how the screen will open. If you want to open the screen by clicking on a button, then type the following code in the buttonâ€™s click listener:

val intent = Intent(this@MainActivity, NextScreen::class.java)
startActivity(intent)

OR, directly write it like:

startActivity(Intent(this@MainActivity, NextScreen::class.java))

"MainActivity" is the name of the current activity and "NextScreen" is the name of the activity you want to open.

4. Another method of opening the next screen is the coroutine scope method, which is safer:

CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main).launch {
    startActivity(Intent(this@MainActivity, NextScreen::class.java))
}
